title: my PBE account is inactive I need helpðŸ˜ž
body: Hello riot i need help I have a PBE account but he is inactive D: i saw there is something with reactivate and cycles. I dont understand this do i have to try to make a new PBE account or what. Is it possible too that im baned :/ ? Please give me feedback soon cause I want to try the new assasins before they will be realised on live servers

replies.body:
All old PBE accounts that were part of our old, unlinked system (prior to 10/25/2013) were deactivated in a number of waves. There were emails sent out to the emails associated with these accounts to make this known as well as have you reapply for PBE access. In order to access the PBE again, you'll need to reapply.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Dude i really need help with my account my username is **[REDACTED]** and i bought the account off someone and i played 1 game then when i tried to login again it said inactive account please can you e mail me from **[REDACTED]**
I need help urgently 
Thanks, NUZ

I had to redact some of the information in your reply because it's account-sensitive. We do not recognize the sale or ownership transfer of any account, as it is against the [**Terms of Use**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse). This is a practice to maintain the integrity of the game and competitive spirit of League.

We will be unable to assist you in recovering the account in *any capacity*. Let me know if you have any questions.
